summary: This document is a set of AT&T wireless subscriber information records, likely obtained via subpoena or search warrant, showing accounts and lines associated with Scott Borgerson. It details multiple phone lines and devices billed to him, including lines for 'G MAX', 'NOAH BORGERSON', 'G WIFI', and himself.

persons.name: Scott Borgerson
persons.context: The primary account holder for multiple AT&T wireless lines and devices, with an account established in 2004. He is the billing party for lines associated with 'G MAX', 'NOAH BORGERSON', 'G WIFI', and 'SCOTT G BORGERSON'.

persons.name: Noah Borgerson
persons.context: A user on a wireless line under Scott Borgerson's AT&T account, with service starting on September 20, 2019. Listed as the contact name for the line.

connections.description: Scott Borgerson is the financial liable party for a wireless line used by Noah Borgerson, indicating a likely familial or financial responsibility connection.

events.title: Records Produced
events.description: AT&T wireless subscriber information records for Scott Borgerson's account were produced, likely in response to a legal request.

keyFacts: Scott Borgerson maintained an active AT&T wireless account since March 13, 2004, and was the financial liable party for multiple lines/devices.
The account included lines for individuals/devices named 'G MAX', 'NOAH BORGERSON', 'G WIFI', and 'SCOTT G BORGERSON'.
The document is marked 'AT&T PROPRIETARY' and 'for use by authorized person only', indicating it was likely obtained via legal process (subpoena/warrant) for an investigation.
The records were produced on June 17, 2020, suggesting investigative activity around that date related to Scott Borgerson's communications.
